TopicTitle: Captain Sam's (etc) -- Weebles Wobble but Your Lander Won't Fall Down

Articles.Content:
Captain* Sam's Locational Desafification Equipment

And Rentals

Have you ever wanted something poorly designed, poorly concieved, and built even worse? Well you're in luck!

For the low low price of your life you too can have... Stuff that will probably get you killed!

First off the assembly line of Captain Sam's garage is the Weeble Bottom (Weeblebutt) landing and stability system.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A large weighted steel halfsphere, quite sturdy and prone to not falling over, may increase fuel needs by a lot.

Download

(License included)

* Captain Sam is not an actual captain

Everything contained within the Captain Sam's pack is as of this time garbage, I would appreciate remaining listed in the cfg file "Author" field, but the official license is:

Do what you want with these assets and configurations

Do not release anything as "official Captain Sam's" without permission

Edited August 22, 2014 by sal_vager

Oh man that's funny, I would totally use this just to watch the disasterous hilarity that ensues! xD

EDIT: And I totally didn't rush to think of and type something to say so I could be the first poster... O.o

Edited November 14, 2013 by CoriW

Well, that's a creative solution, for sure...

Excellent idea!

You should have it do double duty as a heavy duty heat shield and make it compatible with Deadly Reentry.

Edit: I'm very tempted to put a bunch of lights on it and deploy several of them off in the water just off of the launch area as buoys.

Edited November 14, 2013 by Tommygun
Its very kerbalish way to landing on nosecone
You should make that a wheel part with suspension, but no ability to roll or brake - just bounce.
Lol to the above, but if you could build that then you could build airbags.... BOUNCING ON DUNA!!! WOOT. And then bouncing on gilly to see if I can reach escape velocity. :3
instead of making it heavy, why not put a bunch of fuel in it? that way increased deltaV and same weight
Unless you've already used that fuel before you land. Then you're top-heavy and even more fun ensues.

You should make that a wheel part with suspension, but no ability to roll or brake - just bounce.

Go go gadget pogo stick!
Whi this brilliant idea wasnt used in real life?

Whi this brilliant idea wasnt used in real life?

Who said it wasn't?

Who said it wasn't?

Thanks for this info.

Greys, i suggest adding techrequired in cfg file.
Wait a sec, is the round weeblebase actually separated from the body by suspension like a landing gear, because that would be cool.

Version of all three (or four sizes if you count 3,75) woudl be nice.

And weight adjusted by tweakables? Maybe add some ballast resource that can fill this "landing gear".
I used to have a set of Weebles when I was little. This has me grinning. SPACE WEEBLES!!!
